dmca.title: You are being sueed....
dmca.body:
Cause of Action:
Over the past several months defendants have been publishing various statements, comments and other materials on the internet falsely and wrongfully accusing plaintiff of among other things, fradulent business practices and posting "stolen" job listings.

The defamatory statements, comments and materials published by the defendants are libelous on their face, and were made with the intent to harm plaintiff's business.

As a proximate result of defendants' wrongful conduct, plaintiff's good reputation in the industry has been harmed, and plaintiff has suffered compensatory damages exceeding $250,000.

Plaintiff is informed and believes and on that basis alleges the conduct of the defendants was willful, fraudulent, malicious, and oppresive, thereby entitling plaintiff to punitive damanges in an amount to be established at trial.
